name: Color Thief
description:
Color Thief is a thrilling easy platformer for everyone in the family!

We offer amazing visuals, stunning movement, and beautiful music!

This was made over the course of the 8 bits to infinity game jam!

The team is made up of myself, Sno0pyP, NickPadilla25, and Hyperbeam150

Hyperbeam150 created all the art, and animations.

NickPadilla25 programmed the movement and created lvl's 2 and 3.

Sno0pyP programmed and designed various aspects of the games core functions.

Frogger35 programmed and designed various aspects of the games core functions.

Controls:

W for jumping and wall jumping

A for moving left

D for moving right

Left Shift to DASHHH

Music by: http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1518

license for music: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

0 changes were made to the music. It's pretty good already.

We would love to hear from you! Please leave us a comment down below!
